about_the_game:
Nirvana is a multi-action loglike game that compares the characteristics of the loglike genre to the doctrine of Tibetan Buddhism's reincarnation. Go on an adventure to protect the world by becoming the twins Padma and Fema, who shared the power of God that should lead to one for generations!

Players can play distinctive characters, each of which is 'Padma' with the physical power of God and 'Pema' with the magical power of God.

You can earn items by clearing the battle zones that appear in the game. Players who win items There are two types in total: an exclusive item that applies only to one player, and a common item that applies effect to both players. Save the acquired item in one inventory for two people to activate the ability of the item!

Each item has its own different shapes and fits into the inventory to strategically collaborate on limited space. You can expand the inventory space every time you clear the stage!

There are two areas of Human-do and Hell-do, and each area consists of 12 stages, including six stages in Tibetan forests, villages, and temples. At each stage, we have to find and kill the Human-do creatures who became servants of the cold air due to the 'Maha Mudra', and dye the world with cold air and evil!

Players can play distinctive characters, each of which is 'Padma' with the physical power of God and 'Pema' with the magical power of God.

You can earn items by clearing the battle zones that appear in the game. Players who win items There are two types in total: an exclusive item that applies only to one player, and a common item that applies effect to both players. Save the acquired item in one inventory for two people to activate the ability of the item!

Each item has its own different shapes and fits into the inventory to strategically collaborate on limited space. You can expand the inventory space every time you clear the stage!

There are two areas of Human-do and Hell-do, and each area consists of 12 stages, including six stages in Tibetan forests, villages, and temples. At each stage, we have to find and kill the Human-do creatures who became servants of the cold air due to the 'Maha Mudra', and dye the world with cold air and evil!
name: 니르바나 NIRVANA

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit | Windows 8 64-bit | Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 | AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Core i5-2500K | AMD Ryzen 5 1400
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit | Windows 8 64-bit | Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K | AMD Ryzen 5 1400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Core i5-2500K | AMD Ryzen 5 1400
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 Compatible

short_description: Nirvana is a "Multi Action Loglike" game that compares the characteristics of the loglike genre to the doctrine of Tibetan Buddhism's reincarnation. Go on an adventure to protect the world by becoming twins Padma and Pema, who shared the power of God that should lead to one for generations!
